recommended_movies: The Day the Earth Stood Still (1951)

simulated_ratings.title: Double Indemnity (1944)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Seductive fatalism and razor-sharp crime plotting are exactly my noir jam.

simulated_ratings.title: Out of the Past (1947)
simulated_ratings.feeling: The pull of a dark past and doomed romance hits my noir sweet spot.

simulated_ratings.title: Night and the City (1950)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Petty schemes spiraling into desperation make for satisfyingly grim crime drama.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Postwar intrigue and slippery loyalties wrapped in moody suspense I savor.

simulated_ratings.title: Touch of Evil (1958)

simulated_ratings.feeling: Suggestion and unease over shocks—my favorite flavor of haunted-house terror.
